org.restlet.ext.wadl

Class WadlWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.util.WrapperRestlet
        • org.restlet.ext.wadl.WadlWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WadlDescribable, Uniform

    public abstract class WadlWrapper
extends WrapperRestlet
implements WadlDescribable
    WADL wrapper for Restlet instances. Useful if you need to provide the WADL documentation for instances of classes such as Directory.
    Author:
    Thierry Boileau
